nodes.text: Imperial Communique #87341.36a was an internal Imperial report authored by Major Herrit of Imperial Intelligence for the attention of Emperor Palpatine. It detailed the Empire's knowledge of Luke Skywalker in the wake of his actions at the Battle of Yavin. It also included another request that Lord Darth Vader be restrained from killing Herrit's subordinates due to the expenses and time it took to training them.
